subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Richard Petty, the 71-year-old king of stock-car racing, said he would field a car in the Indianapolis 500 for the first time on May 24. John Andretti will drive the car, which will carry Petty’s famous No. 43 and a red and blue paint scheme similar to the cars Petty raced. Petty won 200 races at Nascar’s top level but never competed in the Indy 500 because it was held on the same day as the Coca-Cola 600. He attended the Indy 500 for the first time last year.
